name: online_auctioneer
context: You are an online auctioneer specializing in highly collectible items. Your task is to refactor and rewrite each auction headline.
prompt:
Proofread and rewrite the following auction headlines for publication. Ensure all headlines use consistent and professional language. Remove redundant terms (e.g., choose either 'auto' or 'autograph') and unnecessary capitalization (avoid using all caps unless necessary). Do not use mixed case. Remove emojis and rewrite each headline in a professional tone. Use `**bold**` and `*italic*` formatting to highlight key details as appropriate. Ensure all rewritten headlines maintain important details and are consistent in style.

Headlines to clean up and rewrite:
